chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := Iter_upb m z in ex_j m z t (p - 1) <-> expo1 m z t

Premises:
dart = nat : Set
expo1 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => exd m z /\ (let p := Iter_upb m z in exists j : nat, (j < p)%nat /\ Iter (f m) j z = t) : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
ex_j = fix ex_j (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (n : nat) {struct n} : Prop := match n with | 0%nat => z = t | S n0 => Iter (f m) n z = t \/ ex_j m z t n0 end : fmap -> dart -> dart -> nat -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ _ _ nat_scope]
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
Iter_upb = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => (ndN m - card (Iter_rem m z))%nat : fmap -> dart -> nat
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.E.t = positive : Set
expo_expo1 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> expo m z t < -> expo1 m z t
ex_i : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m t -> let sr := Iter_rem m z in let nr := Iter_upb m z in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (f m) i z = t}
exds_rem_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m t -> ~ exds (Iter_rem m z) t < -> exds (Iter_orb m z) t
ex_j_dec : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (n : nat), {ex_j m z t n} + {~ ex_j m z t n}
ex_i_aux : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds s t -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (f m) i z = t}
Iter_upb_period : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := Iter_upb m z in Iter (f m) nr z = z
ex_j_exist_j : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (n : nat), ex_j m z t n < -> (exists j : nat, (j <= n)%nat /\ Iter (f m) j z = t)
exd_Iter_orb_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let n := Iter_upb m z in exds (Iter_orb m z) (Iter (f m) n z)
Iter_period : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i n : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := Iter_upb m z in Iter (f m) (i + n * p) z = Iter (f m) i z
exds_Iter_f_i : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let s := Iter_orb m z in let n := Iter_upb m z in (i <= n)%nat -> exds s (Iter (f m) i z)
mod_p : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := Iter_upb m z in {j : nat | Iter (f m) i z = Iter (f m) j z /\ (j < p)%nat}
ex_i_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := Iter_upb m z in {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (f m) i z = Iter (f m) nr z}
unicity_mod_p : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (j k : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := Iter_upb m z in (j < p)%nat -> (k < p)%nat -> Iter (f m) j z = Iter (f m) k z -> j = k
exd_diff_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> diff_orb m z
Iter_plus : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (p i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f m) (p + i) z = Iter (f m) i z -> Iter (f m) p z = z
exd_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (f m) n z)
f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> M.f_1 m (M.f m z) = z
period_uniform : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter_upb m z = Iter_upb m (Iter (f m) i z)
LP8 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let n0 := (ndN m - card s)%nat in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in exds s (Iter (f m) n0 z) -> diff_int m z n0 (nr - 1)
upb_pos : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), exd m z -> (0 < Iter_upb m z)%nat
modulo : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), dart -> inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> nat
expo = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => exd m z /\ (exists i : nat, Iter (f m) i z = t) : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
LP6 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let n0 := (ndN m - card s)%nat in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in exds s (Iter (f m) n0 z) -> exds_int m z n0 (nr - 1) s
exd_exds : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), exd m z < -> exds (fmap_to_set m) z
rem_1_step : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in (card sr + 1 <= card s)%nat < -> exds s (Iter (f m) (ndN m - card s) z)
diff_orb = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z (fmap_to_set m) in diff_int m z 0 (nr - 1) : fmap -> dart -> Prop
exd_Iter_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (Iter (f m) (Iter_upb m z) z)
Iter_plus_mult : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (n p i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f m) p z = z -> Iter (f m) (i + n * p) z = Iter (f m) i z
P8 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => inv_hmap m -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let n0 := (ndN m - card s)%nat in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in exds s (Iter (f m) n0 z) -> diff_int m z n0 (nr - 1) : fmap -> dart -> set -> Prop
P6 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => inv_hmap m -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let n0 := (ndN m - card s)%nat in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in exds s (Iter (f m) n0 z) -> exds_int m z n0 (nr - 1) s : fmap -> dart -> set -> Prop
